title: Banacek - Season 2 Complete
description:
Season 2, Episode 1: No Stone Unturned
Original Air Date: 3 October 1973


Season 2, Episode 2: If Max Is So Smart, Why Doesn&#039;t He Tell Us Where He Is?
Original Air Date: 7 November 1973
One morning Max - a huge, complex computer system - is missing from the locked, alarmed and guarded building he filled just the night before. Banacek steps in to find out how tons of computer machinery could be sneaked out leaving only bare walls.

Season 2, Episode 3: The Three Million Dollar Piracy
Original Air Date: 21 November 1973


Season 2, Episode 4: The Vanishing Chalice
Original Air Date: 15 January 1974


Season 2, Episode 5: Horse of a Slightly Different Color
Original Air Date: 22 January 1974
How can a valuable, highly recognizable thoroughbred horse start a practice run around an open racetrack and be an unknown nag when it reaches the finish line? Bet on Banacek to solve the puzzle before the horse thieves make tracks with the real article.

Season 2, Episode 6: Rocket to Oblivion
Original Air Date: 12 February 1974
A huge prototype engine sits sealed in a rotating display case in the middle of a crowded trade-show floor. A power failure turns out the lights for a few seconds, and when the lights return, tons of rocket engine have vanished. Banacek must beat his competition to the solution before Federal agents step in.

Season 2, Episode 7: Fly Me- If You Can Find Me
Original Air Date: 19 February 1974
A commercial jetliner makes an emergency landing at a small desert airstrip, blowing all of its tires and leaving a shaken flight crew. The next morning finds the pilot left guarding the plane dead and the airstrip empty of the immovable aircraft. Enter Banacek - in a chauffeur-driven jeep - to sort out the convolutions of pilots, stewardesses, old business partners and more to learn where the crippled plane has gone.

Season 2, Episode 8: Now You See Me, Now You Don&#039;t
Original Air Date: 12 March 1974



***You will notice a few video glitches, namely in episode 4 and the beginning of episode 8. The encoding went fine, but they are embedded within the DVDs I have and from what I can tell the master reel of the show. hardly a bother for most people though. enjoy (:
